#summary Does Glossword run under Windows?
#labels FAQ,eng

=== Does Glossword run under Windows? ===

Glossword is PHP-script and it runs under any operating system supported by PHP. Yes, Glossword runs under Windows 2000, Windows XP and Windows Vista also.

To run PHP-scripts on Windows, use [http://glossword.biz/glosswordwamp/ Glossword WAMP].

In other way, you may install PHP as a FastCGI- or ISAPI-module for Microsoft IIS (Internet Information Service) and then execute Glossword application.
